name: PBJ: The Sandwich
description:
Have you ever wanted to make the biggest Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich in the world? Well now you can in PBJ : The Sandwich ! Stack endless amounts peanut butter and jelly to build the biggest PBJ sandwich in the world!

Controls: Left Arrow Key = Peanut Butter, Right Arrow Key = Jelly

PBJ : The Sandwich is also available free on

iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/pbj-the-sandwich/id990260478?ls=1&mt=8

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nothingordouble.pbj&hl=en

Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/Nothing-or-Double-PBJ-Sandwich/dp/B00ZJG5U3C/ref=sr_1_1?s=mobile-apps&ie=UTF8&qid=1434227495&sr=1-1&keywords=pbj&pebp=1434227497789&perid=E7854368694F43388CE5
